SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddAntButton
This class represents a button for adding ants to the ant population.
Ant
This abstract class represents an Ant, which runs as a Thread.
AntFactory
This class represents a factory for creating ants with random attributes.
AntGraph
The AntGraph class extends the JPanel class and represents the graphical display of the ant world in the GUI.
Anthill
This class represents an anthill in the ant world.
AntPopulation
The AntPopulation class manages the population of ants in the simulation.
BlueAnt
This abstract class BlueAnt extends Ant.
BluePoints
The BluePoints class extends the Points class and represents the blue points display in the GUI.
Blunderer
Blunderer class extends Collector.
Collecting
Collecting interface.
Collector
Collector class extends RedAnt and implements Collecting interface.
DeadRemoval
The DeadRemoval class extends the Thread class and is responsible for removing dead ants from the ant population.
Drone
Drone class extends BlueAnt.
Dying
Dying interface.
Fighting
Fighting interface.
GraphUpdater
The GraphUpdater class extends the Updater class and is responsible for updating the ant graph.
InfoPanel
The InfoPanel class extends the JPanel class and represents the ant information panel in the GUI.
InfoUpdater
The InfoUpdater class extends the Updater class and is responsible for updating the information panel.
Leaf
This class represents a leaf in the ant world.
Main
The Main class is the entry point of the application.
MainFrame
The MainFrame class extends the JFrame class and represents the main frame of the GUI.
Moving
Moving interface.
Pair
The Pair class represents a pair of integers.
Points
The Points class is an abstract class that extends the JLabel class.
RedAnt
Abstract RedAnt class extends Ant.
RedPoints
The RedPoints class extends the Points class and represents the red points display in the GUI.
Returning
Returning interface.
ScorePanel
The ScorePanel class extends the JPanel class and represents the score panel in the GUI.
ScoreUpdater
The ScoreUpdater class extends the Updater class and is responsible for updating the score panel.
Simulation
The Simulation class is responsible for setting up and running the simulation.
Soldier
Soldier class extends RedAnt and implements Fighting interface.
Stone
This class represents a stone in the ant world.
Updater
The Updater class is an abstract class that extends the SwingWorker class.
Vertex
This class represents a vertex in the ant world.
VertexFactory
This class represents a factory for creating vertices with random attributes.
Worker
Worker class extends BlueAnt and implements Fighting and Collecting interfaces.
World
The World class represents the world in which the ants live.
